text: Wanda De Jesus (born August 26, 1958) is an American actress. She was the fourth actress to play Santana Andrade in NBC's soap opera Santa Barbara. She is also known for her role as Graciella Rivers in Blood Work. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Manhattan
title: Wanda De Jesus
